value.name: Emanuel, Johnson Deposition Tapes Released In LeGrier Wrongful Death Case
value.description: City lawyers fought to have the Mayor and Police Superintendent’s video depositions sealed permanently, but a judge ordered they be released once a jury was selected in the civil case.
